identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Music, Theater and Dance

block.p: Pit Menousek Pinegar, Ayana Cahrr and Rebecca VerNooy are among the 30 female artists presenting their work in Womenkind VI, a festival of one-woman shows that runs from tonight to March 31 at One Dream Theater, 232 West Broadway, near Franklin Street, TriBeCa. Performances are at 7:30 P.M. Tuesday through Friday, 2 and 7:30 P.M. on Saturday and 2 P.M. Sunday. Tickets tonight for a benefit and post-performance reception are $25; $15 for other performances and $35 for a festival pass to all performances. Information: (212) 769-6814.

Performances are at 7:30 P.M. Tuesday through Friday, 2 and 7:30 P.M. on Saturday and 2 P.M. Sunday.
